00070 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 uint32 UTL_calc_crc32
00078     (
00079     uint8   const * const data,
00080     uint32          const size,
00081     uint32          const initial_value
00082     )
00083 {
00084 /*----------------------------------------------------------
00085 Local Variables
00086 ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00087 uint32      actual_crc;
00088 
00089 actual_crc = UTL_accumulate_crc32( data, size, initial_value );
00090 actual_crc = UTL_complete_crc32( actual_crc );
00091 
00092 return( actual_crc );
00093 }   /* UTL_calc_crc32() */
00094 
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 uint32 UTL_accumulate_crc32
00110     (
00111     uint8   const * const data,
00112     uint32          const size,
00113     uint32          const accumulative_value
00114     )
00115 {
00116 /*----------------------------------------------------------
00117 Local Variables
00118 ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00119 uint32      actual_crc;
00120 uint32      i;
00121 
00122 
00123 actual_crc = accumulative_value;
00124 for( i = 0; i < size; i++ )
00125     {
00126     actual_crc = my_crc32_tbl[ (data[ i ] ^ actual_crc) & 255] ^ (0xFFFFFF & (actual_crc >> 8));
00127     }
00128 
00129 return( actual_crc );
00130 }   /* UTL_accumulate_crc32 */
00131 
00132 
00133 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 uint32 UTL_complete_crc32
00145     (
00146     uint32          const actual_crc
00147     )
00148 {
00149 return( ~actual_crc );
00150 }   /* UTL_complete_crc32() */
